skillTree.localised_description: Larger than most others of its kind, the ferocious Cold One named 'Spite' is truly a creature fit for a heartless murderer like Malus Darkblade.

enabled_if: Unit has exceeded the murderous prowess value

skillTree.localised_description: There is great pleasure to be derived from the humiliation and suffering of others; this one has felt and revelled in it.
The strength of this warrior's attack never wavers for an instance, such is the opprobrium felt for their hated High Elf cousins.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against High Elves

skillTree.localised_description: The honing of a Druchii's affinity with animals assures that the bestial ranks heed his imperious command with obedience.

effects.description:
Charge bonus: +10 for Cold One Knights, Cold One Dread Knights and Cold One Chariot units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +10 for Harpies, War Hydra, Kharibdyss, Wyrm, Sea Dragon, Black Dragon, Feral Manticore and Bloodwrack Medusae units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The Bloody-handed God watches over his disciples.
Magic's dark mistress has a care for her dutiful acolytes.
Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Lords

skillTree.localised_description: Each sip of the elixir is a harsh reminder of what he has become.
Malus does not bleed, nor feel pain. Such expressions of the flesh have long since fallen away.
Every moment of silence is but a slaughter yet begun.

effects.description: Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +20%

skillTree.localised_description: â€œIf nothing else, Malus Darkblade, you can be counted on to react to adversity with as much violence as is physically possible."

ui_effects.localised_text: Explosion does not affect friendly troops

skillTree.localised_description: He is unnatural; an aberrant of the darkest kind. To lay eyes upon him in battle stirs a primal fear in the hearts of men and Elves alike.

effects.description:
Attribute: Causes Terror
	(While transformed into Tz'arkan)

skillTree.localised_description: Wounds of the body can be unmade, for they are immaterial and insignificant.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +30% for this Lord
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "The Lord of Ruin is coming for you. Onwards, beast of the deep earth!"

effects.description:
Attrition: -25% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Vigour loss reduction: -50% for Cold One Knights, Cold One Dread Knights and Cold One Chariot units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Sleepless nights afford the Lord of Hag Graef time to viciously and efficiently tackle tedious matters. Like taxes, always taxes...

effects.description:
On turn start, Lords in this character's region have a chance to gain 1 loyalty
	(own characters in region)

skillTree.localised_description: "With hate, all things are possible."

effects.description: Weapon strength: +25% when fighting against anything and everything

skillTree.localised_description: The tough, scaly hide of the Sea Dragon provides excellent protection against all manner of blows.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, itâ€™s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
Full-Plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
What the enemy cannot see, it cannot hit. What the enemy cannot see, it cannot survive.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.
There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +100
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Magic is a most useful tool on the field of battle, but generally secondary in the face of good, old-fashioned brute force.

skillTree.localised_description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.
This Lord expects utter obedience from the smallfolk, and has little time for insurrections or petty revolts.
This one ensures that those captured in battle wished they'd died on the field, so great is the cruelty that awaits them.
"You will serve me, wretch, or you will die, there is no other option."
If there were annals detailing the dastardly deeds of the sackers and looters of the world, this inveterate brigand would feature heavily.
Someone has to ensure the numbers and quality of recruits remain high.
"The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.localised_description: A good quartermaster can ration equipment and foodstuffs efficiently, making supplies last longer.
Knowing precisely where and when to launch an ambush, and against who, takes an unusual level of guile.
The ancient Asur arts teach one how to heal as well as how to harm.

factionEffects.localised_description: With his blackened soul forcibly fused to that of the treacherous Daemon Tzâ€™arkan, Malus Darkblade is one of the most powerful and unpredictable Dreadlords of the Druchii, renowned for his dark determination and quenchless avarice for power.

effects.description: Malus is possessed by the Daemon Tzâ€™arkan, who is controlled with the use of elixirs
Tzâ€™arkanâ€™s Whispers: The Daemon influences Malus to commit acts of slaughter and cruelty

items.colour_text: "The Time of Blood is at hand!"
